[[Image:Ubisoft Motion Track camera Wii.jpg|thumb|Ubisoft Motion Track Camera]] In 2009 Ubisoft released the [[Ubisoft Motion Tracking Camera]] for the [[Wii]] that detects the movement of the gamer to play games like ''[[Your Shape]]'' and ''Racquet Sports''. This technology was created by Ubisoft Barcelona, Spain.
+
In 2009 Ubisoft released the [[Ubisoft Motion Tracking Camera]] for the [[Wii]] that detects the movement of the gamer to play games like ''[[Your Shape]]'' and ''Racquet Sports''. This technology was created by Ubisoft Barcelona, Spain.
